description: DAT-401 YouTube video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ggDIat_FZtA&t=3s by Rick Houlihan, Principal Solutions Architect
author: Pascal

collections.description:
Problem is that it ends up costing 1600 RCU to read 50 messages, with formula:

Items evaluated by query * Avg item size * Conversion ratio * Consistent/Eventually consistent reads = # of RCU

50 * 256kb * (1 RCU /4kb) * (1/2) = 1600 RCU
